007package renderer.models_TP;
008
009import renderer.scene.*;
010import renderer.scene.primitives.*;
011import renderer.scene.util.MeshMaker_TP;
012import renderer.scene.util.MeshType;
013
014/**
015   Create a solid model of a sector of a disk
016   in the xy-plane centered at the origin.
017<p>
018   See <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circular_sector" target="_top">
019                https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Circular_sector</a>
020
021   @see Disk
022   @see CircleSector
023   @see RingSector
024   @see ConeSector
025   @see CylinderSector
026   @see SphereSector
027   @see TorusSector
028*/
029public class DiskSector extends Model implements MeshMaker_TP
030{
031   public final double r;
032   public final double theta1;
033   public final double theta2;
034   public final int n;
035   public final int k;
036   public final MeshType type;
037
038   /**
039      Create half a disk in the xy-plane with radius 1,
040      with 8 spokes coming out of the center, and
041      with 6 concentric circles around the disk.
042   */
043   public DiskSector( )
044   {
045      this(1, 0, Math.PI, 6, 8);
046   }
047
048
049   /**
050      Create a sector of a disk in the xy-plane with radius {@code r},
051      starting angle {@code theta1}, ending angle {@code theta2},
052      with {@code k} spokes coming out of the center, and with
053      {@code n} concentric circles around the disk.
054   <p>
055      If there are {@code k} spokes, then each (partial) circle
056      around the center will have {@code k-1} line segments.
057      If there are {@code n} concentric circles around the center,
058      then each spoke will have {@code n} line segments.
059   <p>
060      There must be at least four spokes and at least one concentric circle.
061
062      @param r       radius of the disk
063      @param theta1  beginning angle of the sector (in radians)
064      @param theta2  ending angle of the sector (in radians)
065      @param n       number of concentric circles
066      @param k       number of spokes in the disk
067      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
068      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 4
069   */
070   public DiskSector(final double r,
071                     final double theta1, final double theta2,
072                     final int n, final int k)
073   {
074      this(r, theta1, theta2, n, k, MeshType.HORIZONTAL);
075   }
076
077
078   /**
079      Create a sector of a disk in the xy-plane with radius {@code r},
080      starting angle {@code theta1}, ending angle {@code theta2},
081      with {@code k} spokes coming out of the center, and with
082      {@code n} concentric circles around the disk.
083   <p>
084      If there are {@code k} spokes, then each (partial) circle
085      around the center will have {@code k-1} line segments.
086      If there are {@code n} concentric circles around the center,
087      then each spoke will have {@code n} line segments.
088   <p>
089      There must be at least four spokes and at least one concentric circle.
090
091      @param r       radius of the disk
092      @param theta1  beginning angle of the sector (in radians)
093      @param theta2  ending angle of the sector (in radians)
094      @param n       number of concentric circles
095      @param k       number of spokes in the disk
096      @param type    choose between striped and checkerboard triangle strips
097      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code n} is less than 1
098      @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code k} is less than 4
099   */
100   public DiskSector(final double r,
101                     double theta1, double theta2,
102                     final int n, final int k,
103                     final MeshType type)
104   {
105      super(String.format("Disk Sector(%.2f,%.2f,%.2f,%d,%d)",
106                                       r, theta1, theta2, n, k));
107
108      if (n < 1)
109         throw new IllegalArgumentException("n must be greater than 0");
110      if (k < 4)
111         throw new IllegalArgumentException("k must be greater than 3");
112
113      theta1 = theta1 % (2*Math.PI);
114      theta2 = theta2 % (2*Math.PI);
115      if (theta1 < 0) theta1 = 2*Math.PI + theta1;
116      if (theta2 < 0) theta2 = 2*Math.PI + theta2;
117      if (theta2 <= theta1) theta2 = theta2 + 2*Math.PI;
118
119      this.r = r;
120      this.theta1 = theta1;
121      this.theta2 = theta2;
122      this.n = n;
123      this.k = k;
124      this.type = type;
125
126      // Create the disk's geometry.
127
128      final double deltaR = r / n,
129                   deltaTheta = (theta2 - theta1) / (k - 1);
130
131      // An array of vertices to be used to create triangles.
132      final Vertex[][] v = new Vertex[n][k];
133
134      // Create all the vertices.
135      for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) // choose a spoke (an angle)
136      {
137         final double c = Math.cos(theta1 + j * deltaTheta),
138                      s = Math.sin(theta1 + j * deltaTheta);
139         for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // move along the spoke
140         {
141            final double ri = (i + 1) * deltaR;
142            v[i][j] = new Vertex( ri * c,
143                                  ri * s,
144                                  0 );
145         }
146      }
147      final Vertex center = new Vertex(0,0,0);
148
149      // Add all of the vertices to this model.
150      for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
151      {
152         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
153         {
154            addVertex( v[i][j] );
155         }
156      }
157      addVertex( center );
158      final int centerIndex = n * k;
159
160      // Create all the triangle strips.
161      if (MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type)
162      {
163         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i)
164         {
165            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
166            for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j)
167            {
168               triStrip.addIndex(   i * k + j); // v[i  ][j]
169               triStrip.addIndex((1+i)* k + j); // v[i+1][j]
170            }
171            addPrimitive(triStrip);
172         }
173      }
174      else if (MeshType.VERTICAL == type)
175      {
176         for (int j = 0; j < k - 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
177         {
178            final Primitive triStrip = new TriangleStrip();
179            triStrip.addIndex(centerIndex);
180            for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
181            {
182               triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + j);    // v[i][j  ]
183               triStrip.addIndex((i+0) * k + j+1);  // v[i][j+1]
184            }
185            addPrimitive(triStrip);
186         }
187      }
188      else // MeshType.CHECKER triangle strips
189      {
190         for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) // choose a circle of latitude
191         {
192            for (int j = 0; j < k - 1; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
193            {
194               addPrimitive(
195                  new TriangleStrip(  i * k + j,       // v[i  ][j  ]
196                                   (1+i)* k + j,       // v[i+1][j  ]
197                                      i * k + j + 1,   // v[i  ][j+1]
198                                   (1+i)* k + j + 1)); // v[i+1][j+1]
199            }
200         }
201      }
202
203      if ( MeshType.HORIZONTAL == type
204        || MeshType.CHECKER == type )
205      {
206         // Create the triangle fan at the center.
207         final Primitive centerFan = new TriangleFan();
208         centerFan.addIndex(centerIndex);
209         for (int j = 0; j < k; ++j) // choose a line of longitude
210         {
211            centerFan.addIndex( j ); // v[0][j]
212         }
213         addPrimitive(centerFan);
214      }
215   }
216
217
218
219   // Implement the MeshMaker_TP interface (four methods).
220   @Override public int getHorzCount() {return n;}
221
222   @Override public int getVertCount() {return k;}
223
224   @Override public MeshType getType() {return type;}
225
226   @Override
227   public DiskSector remake(final int n, final int k, final MeshType type)
228   {
229      return new DiskSector(this.r,
230                            this.theta1, this.theta2,
231                            n, k,
232                            type);
233   }
234}//DiskSector
